"Here Comes the Sun" by The Beatles - This classic song is the perfect opener for a soundtrack that celebrates the ups and downs of life. It captures the hope and optimism that comes with new beginnings, and the joy of feeling the sun on your face after a long winter.

"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina & The Waves - This feel-good song is the perfect addition to any soundtrack that wants to make you feel happy and carefree. It's a celebration of life's little pleasures and the joy of living in the moment.

"Roar" by Katy Perry - This empowering anthem is the perfect choice for any scene that requires a surge of strength and resilience. It's a reminder that no matter what life throws your way, you have the power to rise above it and roar back to life.

"Ho Hey" by The Lumineers - This catchy and upbeat tune would be the perfect addition to any scene that wants to capture the innocence and joy of youth. It's a reminder that life is full of surprises and adventures, and that sometimes the simplest things in life are the most beautiful.
